title: Ticket #3240: condor_gather_info should work for completed jobs (or else exit 1)
description: It currently fails if the given job has left the queue, but there is no indication of that except that the files (once you've untarred them and looked around) contain no useful info! It should use condor_history to succeed, or at the very least report an error at the terminal and exit 1.
